title: Improve menu background color and readability

requirements.text: Update the header navigation menus to use a white or very light blue background with a professional look, ensuring menu items are clearly readable in both desktop dropdown menus and the mobile slide-over menu.

quotes: The menu needs a white or very light blue background with a professional look that makes the menu items listed readable

acceptanceCriteria: Desktop dropdown menus (Customer, Sellers & Businesses, Legal, and authenticated user menu) render on a white or very light blue background and the menu item text is clearly readable.
Mobile menu (SheetContent) renders on a white or very light blue background and all listed links/sections are clearly readable.
Hover/focus states maintain strong contrast and do not reduce readability.
No layout regressions: menu spacing, alignment, and click/tap targets remain functional across desktop and mobile.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only UI component sources); apply styling via component composition/props/classes in app components such as frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx.
Keep changes limited to menu styling/readability; do not introduce new navigation items or routes.
nonGoals: Redesigning the entire site theme or changing non-menu page backgrounds.
Adding new menu features (search, personalization, role-based rework) beyond styling/readability fixes.
